name: Ali Elgohary
bio: I am a passionate technologist and coder with a keen interest in web development. I am always eager to learn new things and stay up-to-date on the latest trends. I have learned a variety of tech stacks and have applied them in many projects. I am always looking for new ways to use technology to solve problems.

experience.description: Worked on various web projects, including building and maintaining web applications, implementing new features, and optimizing performance.
